PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04582025-03-23FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Development Investment Corporation -- Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation
PrecisOrder increasing the amount that may be drawn by the Minister of Finance from the Consolidated Revenue Fund for the purpose of providing loan guarantees as part of the Indigenous Loan Guarantee Program (ILGP) from $5 billion to $10 billion.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order increasing the amount that may be drawn by the Minister of Finance from the Consolidated Revenue Fund for the purpose of providing loan guarantees as part of the Indigenous Loan Guarantee Program (ILGP) from $5 billion to $10 billion.
